Package org.moeaframework.util.weights

package org.moeaframework.util.weights
Routines for generating weights for decomposition and reference point methods.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.moeaframework.util
    Collection of general-purpose utilities.
  • Class
    Description
    NormalBoundaryIntersectionGenerator
    Generates weights using the Normal Boundary Intersection (NBI) method.
    RandomGenerator
    Generates weights randomly.
    UniformDesignGenerator
    Generates weights according to a uniform design of mixtures using the Hammersley low-discrepancy sequence generator.
    WeightGenerator
    Interface for generating a sequence of weights.
